How can I use the `listunspent` command to filter unspent transaction outputs (UTXOs) in Verus?

You can use the `listunspent` command with parameters to filter unspent transaction outputs (UTXOs) in Verus. For example, `verus listunspent 6 9999999 "["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV","RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV"]"` filters UTXOs by minimum and maximum confirmations, and by specific addresses.

Examples
> verus listunspent 
> verus listunspent 6 9999999 "["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV","RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV"]"
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listunspent", "params": [6, 9999999 "["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV","RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV"]"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
